root.Summary: 1: Laurinavicius A, Green AR, Laurinaviciene A, Smailyte G, Ostapenko V,Meskauskas R, Ellis IO. Ki67/SATB1 ratio is an independent prognostic factor ofoverall survival in patients with early hormone receptor-positive invasive ductalbreast carcinoma. Oncotarget. 2015 Oct 15. doi: 10.18632/oncotarget.5838. [Epubahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26512778.
